metadata.title: CVE-2024-22749 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: GPAC v2.3 was detected to contain a buffer overflow via the functiongf_isom_new_generic_sample_description function in theisomedia/isom_write.c:4577

criterions.comment: gpac: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
